purpose: The email announces the 9th International Conference on Information Technology & Systems (ICITS'26) to be held in Roat치n Island, Honduras, from February 16-18, 2026. It invites researchers and practitioners to submit original papers in English, Spanish, or Portuguese on various topics related to Information Technology & Systems. The email outlines submission guidelines, including formatting requirements, review processes, and publication details. Important dates for paper submission, acceptance notification, and registration are also provided.

evidence_sentences: ICITS'26 - 9th Int. Conference on Information Technology & Systems
We are pleased to invite you to submit your original papers to ICITS'26.
Submitted papers should be related with one or more of the main themes proposed for the Conference.
All submissions will be reviewed on the basis of relevance, originality, importance and clarity.
All papers will be subjected to a 'double-blind review' by at least two members of the Scientific Committee.
Payment of Registration, to ensure the inclusion of an accepted paper in the conference proceedings: November 19, 2025.
